Experiment Method.Assay Method: Cell viability assay under oxidative stress

Material used.Description: HEK293 and SH-SY5Y cells were used to assess stress tolerance after H2O2 exposure.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: Loss of protective function (ERK pathway activation not observed)
Readout description.Result Description: Wild-type LRRK2 increased stress tolerance, while Y1699C and G2019S mutants showed no improvement.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: Loss of protective function (ERK pathway activation not observed)
Readout description.Result Description: Wild-type LRRK2 increased stress tolerance, while Y1699C and G2019S mutants showed no improvement.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the literature.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Improved stress tolerance compared to mutants
